name: NSPathControlDelegate
desc: A set of methods that can be implemented by the delegate of a path control object to support dragging to and from the control.

items.name: func pathControl(NSPathControl, shouldDrag: NSPathComponentCell, with: NSPasteboard) -> Bool
items.desc: Implement this method to enable dragging from the control.

items.name: func pathControl(NSPathControl, validateDrop: NSDraggingInfo) -> NSDragOperation
items.desc: Implement this method to enable dragging onto the control.

items.name: func pathControl(NSPathControl, acceptDrop: NSDraggingInfo) -> Bool
items.desc: Implement this method to accept previously validated contents dropped onto the control.

items.name: func pathControl(NSPathControl, willDisplay: NSOpenPanel)
items.desc: Implement this method to customize the Open panel shown by a pop-up–style path.

items.name: func pathControl(NSPathControl, willPopUp: NSMenu)
items.desc: Implement this method to customize the menu of a pop-up–style path.

items.name: func pathControl(NSPathControl, shouldDrag: NSPathControlItem, with: NSPasteboard) -> Bool
